metadata.Title: CVE-2008-5150 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description: sample.sh in maildirsync 1.1 allows local users to append data to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/maildirsync-*.#####.log temporary file.

notes.Note: jdstrand> per Debian, unsafe code is in example script

criterions.comment: maildirsync package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
